languages.text: "Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} позволил{rt_mf||а} мне петь для {rt_mf|него|нее} до самого заката. Каждого, кто не умолкал при нашем приближении, и мешал {rt_mf|ему|ей} наслаждаться музыкой ждала немедленная казнь".

traits.locale_text: "Звездн{mf|ый|} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} заставлял{mf||а} меня петь, пока я не посадила голос. И каждый раз, когда я срывала ноту, он{mf||а} казнил{mf||а} одного из слуг".

languages.text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} allowed me to sing for {rt_mf|him|her} till sundown. Anyone who didn't fall silent when we approached, and distracted {rt_mf|him|her} from enjoying the music, was immediately executed."
languages.original_text: "Звездн{rt_mf|ый|ая} Госпо{rt_mf|дин|жа} позволил{rt_mf||а} мне петь для {rt_mf|него|нее} до самого заката. Каждого, кто не умолкал при нашем приближении, и мешал {rt_mf|ему|ей} наслаждаться музыкой ждала немедленная казнь".

traits.locale_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} allowed me to sing for {rt_mf|him|her} till sundown. Anyone who didn't fall silent when we approached, and distracted {rt_mf|him|her} from enjoying the music, was immediately executed."

"The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} allowed me to sing for {rt_mf|him|her} till sundown. Anyone who didn't fall silent when we approached, and distracted {rt_mf|him|her} from enjoying the music, was immediately executed."

languages.text: “来自上界的大人命令我唱歌，一直唱到日落时分才停下来。当我们接近其他人时，要是有谁没有立刻安静下来，扰了大人的雅兴，便会被当场处决。”
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} allowed me to sing for {rt_mf|him|her} till sundown. Anyone who didn't fall silent when we approached, and distracted {rt_mf|him|her} from enjoying the music, was immediately executed."

traits.locale_text: “来自上界的大人命令我唱歌，一直唱到日落时分才停下来。当我们接近其他人时，要是有谁没有立刻安静下来，扰了大人的雅兴，便会被当场处决。”

languages.text: «{rt_mf|El Señor|La Señora} Celestial me permitió cantar para {rt_mf|él|ella} hasta el atardecer. Quienes no guardaban silencio cuando nos acercábamos y {rt_mf|le|la} distraían de la música eran ejecutados de inmediato».
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} allowed me to sing for {rt_mf|him|her} till sundown. Anyone who didn't fall silent when we approached, and distracted {rt_mf|him|her} from enjoying the music, was immediately executed."

traits.locale_text: «{rt_mf|El Señor|La Señora} Celestial me permitió cantar para {rt_mf|él|ella} hasta el atardecer. Quienes no guardaban silencio cuando nos acercábamos y {rt_mf|le|la} distraían de la música eran ejecutados de inmediato».

languages.text: "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, gün batımına dek ona şarkı söylememe izin verdi. Yaklaştığımızda susmayan yahut onu musikiden alıkoyan herkes oracıkta idam edildi."
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} allowed me to sing for {rt_mf|him|her} till sundown. Anyone who didn't fall silent when we approached, and distracted {rt_mf|him|her} from enjoying the music, was immediately executed."

traits.locale_text: "Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, gün batımına dek ona şarkı söylememe izin verdi. Yaklaştığımızda susmayan yahut onu musikiden alıkoyan herkes oracıkta idam edildi."
"Semavi {rt_mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz} sesim kısılana kadar şarkı söylememi istedi. Vurduğum her yanlış nota için hizmetkârlardan birini infaz ettirdi."

languages.text: 「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は日没まで御前で歌うことを許してくれたの。私たちが近づいても沈黙せずにいて、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}が音楽を楽しむのを邪魔した者は、その場ですぐに処刑されたよ」
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} allowed me to sing for {rt_mf|him|her} till sundown. Anyone who didn't fall silent when we approached, and distracted {rt_mf|him|her} from enjoying the music, was immediately executed."

traits.locale_text: 「天の{rt_mf|君|姫}は日没まで御前で歌うことを許してくれたの。私たちが近づいても沈黙せずにいて、{rt_mf|彼|彼女}が音楽を楽しむのを邪魔した者は、その場ですぐに処刑されたよ」

languages.text: « Sa Céleste Seigneurie m'a permis de chanter pour {rt_mf|lui|elle} jusqu'au coucher du soleil. Quiconque ne prenait pas soin de se taire à notre approche et l'empêchait de profiter de mon chant était immédiatement exécuté. »
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} allowed me to sing for {rt_mf|him|her} till sundown. Anyone who didn't fall silent when we approached, and distracted {rt_mf|him|her} from enjoying the music, was immediately executed."

traits.locale_text: « Sa Céleste Seigneurie m'a permis de chanter pour {rt_mf|lui|elle} jusqu'au coucher du soleil. Quiconque ne prenait pas soin de se taire à notre approche et l'empêchait de profiter de mon chant était immédiatement exécuté. »

languages.text: "{rt_mf|Der himmlische Herr|Die himmlische Herrin} hat mir erlaubt, bis zum Sonnenuntergang für {rt_mf|ihn|sie} zu singen. Wer nicht verstummte, als wir uns näherten, und damit {rt_mf|seinen|ihren} Genuss der Musik störte, wurde sofort hingerichtet."
languages.original_text: "The Celestial {rt_mf|Lord|Lady} allowed me to sing for {rt_mf|him|her} till sundown. Anyone who didn't fall silent when we approached, and distracted {rt_mf|him|her} from enjoying the music, was immediately executed."

traits.locale_text: "{rt_mf|Der himmlische Herr|Die himmlische Herrin} hat mir erlaubt, bis zum Sonnenuntergang für {rt_mf|ihn|sie} zu singen. Wer nicht verstummte, als wir uns näherten, und damit {mf|seinen|ihren} Genuss der Musik störte, wurde sofort hingerichtet."
